full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 100 of 261 1261
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 A. Yes.
2 Q. And you had been approached by a tabloid to engage that gentleman in a situation; correct?
3 A. Not exactly.
4 Q. You were not asked to encourage that man to get you cocaine?
5 A. No.
6 Q. You were never approached by a tabloid to have that man recorded?
7 A. I was never approached by a tabloid to have him recorded.
8 Q. But, in fact, he was recorded, wasn't he?
9 A. Yes.
10 Q. And he was recorded in conversation with you when you tried to get him to get you drugs; correct?
11 A. Yes.
12 Q. And that became a big tabloid spectacular, wasn't it?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. And that was because of his standing in connection to the Royal Family; correct?
15 A. Yes.
16 Q. And it was quite embarrassing for him and his family; correct?
17 A. I can't speak to his experience of it.
18 Q. You can't even imagine that that would have been embarrassing for him?
19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018437

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear Q&A format. The content discusses a tabloid scandal involving a member of the Royal Family and drug-related activities. The document is well-formatted and legible.
